alert.note: Alert for Brown; Callahan; Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 6:01PM CDT until May 06 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Callahan County in west central Texas... Northern Brown County in west central Texas... Northeastern Coleman County in west central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 600 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Grosvenor, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lake Brownwood State Park around 605 PM CDT. Byrds and Cross Cut around 610 PM CDT. May around 625 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Owens. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
